name: Disney Hocus Pocus: The Sanderson Sisters' Cottage
description: Capture the bewitching joy of a classic movie with this collectible LEGO® Ideas Disney Hocus Pocus: The Sanderson Sisters’ Cottage (21341) set. The cottage can be opened in multiple ways for easy viewing of the interior details, including the museum gift shop, cauldron with a LEGO light brick to illuminate the fire underneath, Book of Spells and the witches’ bat-infested bedroom. Detach the side room where Dani Dennison was captured by the witches and turn the water wheel outside to make pink ‘smoke’ puff out of the chimney.
